newsitem.title: GERMANY: Waigel arrives at Bundesbank during meeting.
newsitem.headline: Waigel arrives at Bundesbank during meeting.

text.p: German Finance Minister Theo Waigel arrived at the Bundesbank to take part in the central bank's fortnightly council meeting on Thursday, an eyewitness outside the Bundesbank said.
A Reuters photographer said he saw Waigel arriving by helicopter at around 1000 GMT.
German finance ministry officials may attend Bundesbank regular fortnightly council meetings but do not have the right to vote.
Earlier, sources from Germany's ruling coalition said Waigel would attend this week's meeting to discuss the revaluation of the country's gold reserves.
The sources said Waigel was not considering selling the reserves.
